Transform your text formatting workflow with Text Separator Pro - the smart, efficient way to convert line-based text into custom-separated formats. Whether you're cleaning up spreadsheet data, preparing CSV files, or formatting code arrays, Text Separator Pro streamlines your text manipulation tasks with just a few clicks.

Key Features:
• Flexible Separators: Choose from common separators (comma, semicolon, pipe, tab) or define your own custom separator
• Smart Formatting Options:
  - Trim whitespace automatically
  - Remove empty lines
  - Add quotes around items
• Clipboard Integration:
  - Quick paste functionality
  - One-click copy to clipboard
  - Keyboard shortcuts support (Ctrl/Cmd + C/V)

Perfect for:
• Developers converting arrays or lists
• Data analysts preparing CSV data
• Content editors formatting content
• Anyone working with structured text

Why Choose Text Separator Pro:
• Clean, Modern Interface: Intuitive design that makes text transformation effortless
• Real-time Preview: See your formatted text instantly as you make changes
• Zero Learning Curve: Start using it immediately with no configuration needed
• Lightweight & Fast: Minimal impact on your browser's performance

Use Cases:
• Convert line-separated lists into comma-separated values
• Transform spreadsheet columns into SQL IN clauses
• Create formatted array declarations for programming
• Clean up and standardize text formatting
• Prepare data for import into other applications

Text Separator Pro respects your privacy and works completely offline - no data is ever sent to external servers. The extension requires only minimal permissions for clipboard operations to provide its functionality.

Install Text Separator Pro today and transform the way you handle text formatting tasks!
